Pam Golding (née Stroebel; 12 Septemba 1928 - 3 Eprel 2018) bụ onye South Africa na-emepụta ala na ụlọ. Pam Golding Properties, nke ọ tọrọ ntọala na 1976, bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ kachasị ukwuu na South Africa, nwere ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ 300 na sub-Saharan Africa na mba ofesi. Nwa Golding, Andrew Golding, bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ugbu a. Golding nwụrụ na 3 Eprel 2018, mgbe ọ dị afọ 89, n'ụlọ ya na Cape Town, South Africa.
